title: bug322 reproduces with 8g
body:
by **robert.c.nix**: 
What steps will reproduce the problem?

1. cd go/test/bugs
2. 8g bug322.dir/lib.go 
3. 8g bug322.dir/main.go

What is the expected output?

main.8

What do you see instead?

 bug322.dir/main.go:19: implicit assignment of unexported field 'x' of lib.T in method receiver
 bug322.dir/main.go:32: implicit assignment of unexported field 'x' of lib.T in method receiver

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

8g

Which operating system are you using?

Linux rnix-lnx 2.6.18-238.9.1.0.1.el5 #1 SMP Tue Apr 12 19:16:55 EDT 2011 i686 i686 i386
GNU/Linux

Which revision are you using?  (hg identify)

9d7967223815 (release-branch.r57) release.r57.2/release
